AND 코드 IN( WITH TT AS ( SELECT ( SELECT CATE_DEPTH_2 FROM TBL_AD_CATE_CONFIG WHERE SEASON_SEQ = #{seasonSeq}
AND CATE_DEPTH_1='CM01501'
AND CATE_DEPTH_1='CM01502'
AND USE_YN='Y' ) TXT FROM DUAL ) SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TXT, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) AS TXT FROM TT CONNECT BY INSTR(TXT, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0 )

AND TAB1.코드 IN( WITH TT AS ( SELECT (SELECT CATE_DEPTH_2 FROM TBL_AD_CATE_CONFIG WHERE SEASON_SEQ = '94' AND CATE_DEPTH_1='CM01501' AND USE_YN='Y') TXT FROM DUAL ) SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TXT, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) AS TXT FROM TT CONNECT BY INSTR(TXT, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0 )

AND TAB1.코드 IN( WITH TT AS ( SELECT (SELECT CATE_DEPTH_2 FROM TBL_AD_CATE_CONFIG WHERE SEASON_SEQ = #{seasonSeq} AND CATE_DEPTH_1=#{cateDepth1} AND USE_YN='Y') TXT FROM DUAL ) SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TXT, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) AS TXT FROM TT CONNECT BY INSTR(TXT, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0 )
AND TAB2.코드 IN( WITH TT AS ( SELECT (SELECT CATE_DEPTH_3 FROM TBL_AD_CATE_CONFIG WHERE SEASON_SEQ = #{seasonSeq} AND CATE_DEPTH_1=#{cateDepth1} AND USE_YN='Y') TXT FROM DUAL ) SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TXT, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) AS TXT FROM TT CONNECT BY INSTR(TXT, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0 )
mapper.select: select /* listCategory */ 구분 AS GUBUN ,코드 AS CATECD ,코드명 AS CATENM ,구분코드 AS GUBUNCD from UBI09S_WORKS.V_코드정보 where 구분 = #{id}

SELECT SEASON_SEQ /* getSeasonCategory */ ,SITE_NO ,SEASON_CD ,SEASON_GUBUN ,SEASON_CD_DISP ,SEASON_START ,SEASON_END ,DISP_YN ,USE_YN ,REGR_NO ,REG_DTS ,UPDR_NO ,UPD_DTS ,TOP_YN FROM TBL_AD_CATE_SEASON WHERE SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND SEASON_GUBUN = #{seasonGubunCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT /*category.getUbiCategory*/ TAB1.구분 AS GUBUN1 ,TAB1.코드 AS CATECD1 ,TAB1.코드명 AS CATENM1 ,TAB1.구분코드 AS GUBUNCD1
,TAB2.구분 AS GUBUN2 ,TAB2.코드 AS CATECD2 ,TAB2.코드명 AS CATENM2 ,TAB2.구분코드 AS GUBUNCD2
FROM UBI09S_WORKS.V_코드정보 TAB1, UBI09S_WORKS.V_코드정보 TAB2
WHERE TAB1.구분 = 'CATEGORY1' AND TAB2.구분 = 'CATEGORY2' AND TAB1.코드 = SUBSTR(TAB2.코드 , 1 , 2) AND TAB1.코드 != '00'

SELECT GRPTOT FROM( /*category.getUbiCategoryTot*/ SELECT COUNT(GRP_LIST.CATECD1) GRPTOT FROM (SELECT TAB1.구분 AS GUBUN1 ,TAB1.코드 AS CATECD1 ,TAB1.코드명 AS CATENM1 ,TAB1.구분코드 AS GUBUNCD1
,TAB2.구분 AS GUBUN2 ,TAB2.코드 AS CATECD2 ,TAB2.코드명 AS CATENM2 ,TAB2.구분코드 AS GUBUNCD2
FROM UBI09S_WORKS.V_코드정보 TAB1, UBI09S_WORKS.V_코드정보 TAB2
WHERE TAB1.구분 = 'CATEGORY1' AND TAB2.구분 = 'CATEGORY2' AND TAB1.코드 = SUBSTR(TAB2.코드 , 1 , 2) AND TAB1.코드 != '00'
)GRP_LIST GROUP by CATECD1 ORDER BY CATECD1 ASC )

SELECT /*category.getCateDepth*/ A.CATE_DEPTH_2 MEN2, A.CATE_DEPTH_3 MEN3, A.NA_DISP_YN MEN_NA_DISP_YN, B.CATE_DEPTH_2 WOMEN2, B.CATE_DEPTH_3 WOMEN3, B.NA_DISP_YN WOMEN_NA_DISP_YN, C.CATE_DEPTH_2 BRAND, A.NA_DISP_NM MEN_NA_DISP_NM, B.NA_DISP_NM WOMEN_NA_DISP_NM FROM TBL_AD_CATE_CONFIG A, TBL_AD_CATE_CONFIG B, TBL_AD_CATE_CONFIG C WHERE A.SEASON_SEQ = #{seasonSeq} AND A.SEASON_SEQ = B.SEASON_SEQ AND A.SEASON_SEQ = C.SEASON_SEQ AND A.CATE_DEPTH_1='CM01501' AND B.CATE_DEPTH_1='CM01502' AND C.CATE_DEPTH_1='CM01503' AND A.USE_YN='Y' AND B.USE_YN='Y'

SELECT * FROM ( /*category.getdefaultSeason*/ SELECT SEASON_SEQ ,SITE_NO ,SEASON_CD ,SEASON_GUBUN FROM TBL_AD_CATE_SEASON WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DISP_YN = 'Y' AND SEASON_GUBUN != 'CM01403'
AND SITE_NO = #{siteNo}
AND SITE_NO = '10001'
ORDER BY SEASON_GUBUN DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT SEASON_SEQ /*category.getSeasonList*/ ,SITE_NO ,SEASON_CD ,SEASON_GUBUN ,SEASON_CD_DISP FROM TBL_AD_CATE_SEASON WHERE SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND DISP_YN = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SEASON_GUBUN ASC

SELECT 코드 AS CD_NM ,코드명 AS CD_DESC FROM UBI09S_WORKS.V_코드정보 WHERE 구분 = 'BRAND'
AND 코드 IN( WITH TT AS ( SELECT (SELECT CATE_DEPTH_2 FROM TBL_AD_CATE_CONFIG WHERE SEASON_SEQ = #{nowSeq} AND CATE_DEPTH_1='CM01503' AND USE_YN='Y') TXT FROM DUAL ) SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TXT, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) AS TXT FROM TT CONNECT BY INSTR(TXT, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0 ) ORDER BY 코드명 ASC
SELECT 코드 AS CD_NM ,코드명 AS CD_DESC FROM UBI09S_WORKS.V_코드정보 WHERE 구분 = 'BRAND' ORDER BY 코드명 ASC

SELECT SEASON_SEQ /* getSeasonSeq */
FROM TBL_AD_CATE_SEASON WHERE SITE_NO = #{siteNo}
AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DISP_YN = 'Y'
AND SEASON_CD = ( SELECT DECODE( (SELECT SEASON_CD FROM TBL_AD_CATE_SEASON WHERE SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND DISP_YN = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND SEASON_CD = #{seasonCd}) ,NULL ,(SELECT SEASON_CD FROM TBL_AD_CATE_SEASON WHERE SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND SEASON_GUBUN = 'CM01403') ,#{seasonCd} )SEASON_CD FROM DUAL)
AND SEASON_CD = (SELECT DECODE( (SELECT SEASON코드 FROM UBI09S_WORKS.V_상품정보트리거 WHERE 품번 = #{ubiGdsNo} AND ROWNUM = 1 AND SEASON코드 IN( SELECT SEASON_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_AD_CATE_SEASON WHERE SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND SEASON_GUBUN != 'CM01403' AND DISP_YN = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) ) ) , NULL , (SELECT SEASON_CD FROM TBL_AD_CATE_SEASON WHERE SITE_NO = #{siteNo} AND SEASON_GUBUN = 'CM01403') ,(SELECT SEASON코드 FROM UBI09S_WORKS.V_상품정보트리거 WHERE 품번 = #{ubiGdsNo} AND ROWNUM = 1) ) SEASON_CD FROM DUAL)

/*category.listBrand*/ SELECT 코드 AS CD_NM ,코드명 AS CD_DESC ,(SELECT MIN(CATE_DEPTH_1) FROM TBL_AD_CATE_CONFIG WHERE SEASON_SEQ = 3 AND CATE_DEPTH_1 IN ('CM01503','CM01504') AND CATE_DEPTH_2 like '%'||code.코드||'%') SEX FROM UBI09S_WORKS.V_코드정보 code WHERE 구분 = 'BRAND'
AND 코드 IN( WITH TT AS ( SELECT (SELECT WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(CATE_DEPTH_2) FROM TBL_AD_CATE_CONFIG WHERE SEASON_SEQ = #{nowSeq} AND CATE_DEPTH_1 IN (${depthCode}) AND USE_YN='Y') TXT FROM DUAL ) SELECT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TXT, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) AS TXT FROM TT CONNECT BY INSTR(TXT, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1) > 0 ) ORDER BY 코드명 ASC
